Variable: Initial per Capita Domestic Liquid Waste Production
Information: Represents the estimated quantity, in kg/year, that each person produces in human waste

Variable: Fraction of Protein in Diet With Red Meat
Notes: Used to estimate protein content in domestic wastewater. Protein (see IPCC GHG Guidance) . See Table 1 in `Papier et al. (2019) <https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6521004/#app1-nutrients-11-00824>`_ for the source of these numbers.

Variable: Fraction of Protein in Diet Without Red Meat
Log Elasticity DLW Production to GDP Per Capita
Information: Log elasticity :math:`\varepsilon` of domestic wastewater production per capita to GDP/capita. For a year over year growth in GDP/capita :math:`\Delta g`, the change in domestic wastewater production per capita is estimated as :math:`\Delta W_{d} = (1 + \Delta g)^{\varepsilon} - 1`.
Notes: Derived from Jones, E. R., van Vliet, M. T. H., Qadir, M., and Bierkens, M. F. P.: Country-level and gridded estimates of wastewater production, collection, treatment and reuse, Earth Syst. Sci. Data, 13, 237–254, https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-13-237-2021, 2021. See table 3.1 for the regression coefficient associated with the log production of wastewater, found as 0.31.
